It all comes down to whether the weather is nice, and whether or not Jeb did one of the following:

-Signed a contract w./ Kerbfleet including clauses for mutiny, in which he would be subject to fines and the like

-Kerbfleet is a federal organization and has its own laws

-Broke a Kerbin law, something like negligence or drunk driving (piloting?) However, this may be overruled in favor of saving them from Eve
